main event: On November 6, 1954, a witness observed a luminous object in the sky at around 2,000 feet altitude.
interesting points: The object was observed for about 5-7 minutes, It changed colors from white to red and then to green, The witness estimated the object was around the size of a small automobile, No other witnesses were reported, The object appeared to have rapid acceleration and could change direction abruptly.
witness description: The witness is a 38-year-old male without specified educational background details.
